com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.component
Class GOComponentSpatial

java.lang.Object
  com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.component.GOComponent
      com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.component.GOComponentSpatial
Direct Known Subclasses:
GOComponentSpatial2D
public abstract class GOComponentSpatial
extends GOComponent

This component provides a location and an orientation in space, which is currently limited to two dimensions. It is also responsible for movement on the basic (or microscopic) level, in that it defines the length of an atomic step of movement and is also able to effect such movement steps. The orientation the component holds is independent of the direction of such movement.

Author:
til
